column4: I'm getting a lot of failed connections to google today, is it just me? (doesn't seem to be happening with anyone else's site)
try pinging google from terminal, see if you drop packets. Its fine here
this isn't a keyboard issue(although I guess it's related)... somehow alt+button3 on my mouse is mapped to type 'Screenshot'
you have set the shortcut somewhere in that configuration, be it keyboard or mouse
sticky keyboard eh...have you had hansum over?

not physically stuck, sometimes my modifier keys get somehow stuck the wrong way and I have to press them all a couple of times before I can type. Not sure why it is maybe I try to type too fast and get the order I hit them wrong
you missed the joke ;)
I didn't, I guess my sense of humor is cranky this early in the afternoon though :P
can you run:    compiz --replace
yes that's when it complains about the software rasteriser
check video drivers
syk: http://pastebin.com/d57fb9a19
what do you mean by that?
check video drivers are installed right
I'm using the open source ati drivers
you may want to consult /var/log/Xorg.log.0
/var/log/Xorg.0.log    sorry
I can't see any erros there http://pastebin.com/f6df306ec but perhaps I don't know what I'm looking for
try a reboot
that did it, somewhat annoyingly -.-
thanks
